value: I’m a Software Engineer currently based in Valencia, Spain. I have a bachelor's degree in software engineering for the Universidad Politécnica de Valencia, and I have been working as a Software Engineer since 2015.
I have strong knowledge of .NET, .NET Core, C#, SQL Server, Azure, Angular, MongoDB, NodeJs, JavaScript, TypeScript, Entity Framework...
I have been writing in blogs since I was fourteen years old, and I love films, series, music and tennis. Additionally: I am a sushi addict.
